query:
SELECT
                CASE
                    WHEN last_email.state = 'unsubscribed' THEN 1
                    ELSE 0
                END
            FROM (
                SELECT state
                FROM emails e
                WHERE e.user_id = $1
                ORDER BY e.sent_at DESC
                LIMIT 1
            ) AS last_email;

columns.name:
CASE
                    WHEN last_email.state = 'unsubscribed' THEN 1
                    ELSE 0
                END
